channel.title: Serverlits eror
channel.description:
if i want to put my server on the serverlist i always get the same eror :confused:
my server is online i portforwarded and my mates can play on it but i get this eror anyone now how to get my server on the serverlist?
Click here to play the MoparScape 3.2 webclient. Click here to download MoparScape 3.2. Click here to go to the forums.
Click here for hamachi servers (not recommended)
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'projectzero.no-ip.info' OR `ipfield` = '84.31.207.23'' at line 1
